name: Holl
appearance: Kind-faced liturgist with river-calloused hands and a tide-rope belt. Smells of fish, ink, and rain.
character: Patient teacher who believes most knots can be untied with time and kindness.
talents: Finding the right story for a wound
flaws: Slow to act when swiftness is needed
dreams: Compile a concordance of river songs from reed village to sea
Heal the schism between Temple and Collegium
Sit one day at the basins and have his word weigh
secrets: Keeps a storm-harp string from the Skyhook in his prayer roll
Paid the Ferryman with his childhood name for an answer he never speaks
Blessed a smugglers' rung to quiet a riot once
